title: Ok This Needs To Stop
body:
I do not deny my actions leading to my 2 week ban...but this needs to stop.

I do not need people consistently harassing others and myself because of mistakes. And when I mute, I do not need them to be spam missing pinging on my body when I die. 

I do not need people creating actions that lead to tilting, then report you for reacting without getting similar treatment. If I can get a duo or a 3-4 man to report me for reacting, then I want them to get the same punishment. 

It's really sad when the enemy is more friendly and helpful than your own fucking team at giving advice. I don't need my chat logs because I know what I said. But I do want to know if the dickheads from my previous match got similar punishment for harassment and toxicity.

replies.body:
1 report is enough to trigger the system
after 1 it is irrelevant

That's the thing. My reports do next to nothing but they can tag team report after doing nothing but belittle people since champ select. But as soon as the people respond, instareport. 

Im not asking to get unbanned or anything, I want these dickheads to get the same treatment, if not worse, for their actions.

It's like rewarding bullies for stealing your kid's lunch money when people can get away with this.

Riot has stated that in a single game multiple reports do no more than one report does against a person. It just flags the game for review, then when a review is triggered if there is no toxicity it throws it out. Your report holds as much weight, unless you consistently falsely report people, as their entire group does.
why do people always come complain about the banning system when they are banned for being toxic lmfao.

People will intentionally instigate their team, Ban pick intent, harrass teammates over minor mistakes. Flame and degrade them for missing an ability. Do ANYTHING to intentionally TILT THIER OWN TEAM. and then turn around and report thier team for being tilted. In a previous match, I had an adc who would repeatedly flame and degrade the support (me) insult and tell support how useless they were. 
Then called to report me for "leaving lane" when I decided to leave adc and go help mid (I am team support, not adcs personal lane punching bag)

People tilt thier own team, then try and report their team when they get the desired reaction they WANTED in the first place.
Not complaining about being banned, Im complaining about people getting away with being rude as hell and reporting people for reacting ._.
if you are looking for features that improve the visibility of the system (did those guys get punished?) then you'd have to wait till the new client is up and running smoothly first.
You are able to report people via the support ticket as well, if you feel it necessary

Your reports do matter, the system only notifies you if that report is what put someone over the edge.
In addition, open a support ticket to see if rito will do anything towards getting "those dickheads" more p[unishment
You do something more stupid then a bronzie and Ill make them uninstall.
